ENGLISH: Holy War of the Seven Khojas.

The Khojas who have not been active for more than a decade have once again crossed the border from Kokand in an effort to take Kashgar. The weakness of the Qing garrisons in Altishahr have given them the perfect oppurtunity to fight for the region they claim as theres.
Remember what they stole from us
The Invasion of Divan Quli and Wali Khan
It has been 3 years since the last Khoja invasion but they have once again crossed into the Xinjiang province and have laid siege to Kashgar.
The invasion of Husayn Ishan Khwaja

In a move that has surprised absolutely no one, the Khojas, again, have come to take Kashgar and the rest of Xinjiang proper. Husayn Ishan Khwaja the leader of this invasion seems to be working alone but we can expect another invasion soon after we crush this one.
